name: com.postica.binding-system
description:
A powerful tool that simplifies linking objects together quickly and flexibly in a completely agnostic way.

Main Features:
 ▪ Optimized for Performance, delivering near-native speeds for efficient data handling. 
 ▪ Easily bind data using a simple and efficient drag-and-drop system. 
 ▪ Easily expandable by design to support new features and functionality.

samples.description: A demo scene showcasing the Binding System and its features.
A demo scene showcasing the Binding System v1 features. This scene is provided to showcase how to bind with Bind types.

A set of additional converters that can be used with the binding system.
These converters are provided as an example of how to create custom converters.

A set of custom bindings that can be used with the binding system.
These modifiers are provided as an example of how to create custom modifiers.
